\u0930\u0947\u0936\u094d\u092e\u093e \u0: Reshma and Kumar are mysteriously haunted by their past lives. When they finally meet, they fall in love with each other, but their father attempts to separate them.
\u092c\u091a\u092a\u0928 \u0915\u0947 \u: Childhood friends Ram and Avtaar become embroiled in a love triangle when both fall for Sangeeta. Ram sacrifices his love for Avtaar, but his enemy Gundappa Swami threatens to reveal the truth.
\u0915\u094c\u0928 \u0938\u091a\u094d\u0: who is true and who is liar
\u090f\u0915 \u092a\u0941\u0932\u093f\u0: Karan, a policeman, goes undercover to get treatment from Dr. Sapna, a psychiatrist, and investigate the murder for which the doctor has been accused.
\u090f\u0915 \u0906\u0926\u092e\u0940 \u: After crushing a man under a car, Abhay is released and falls in love with his psychopathic daughter. However, on seeing Sonal with Abhay, Sonal's brother accuses Abhay of rape.
\u0905\u0928\u093f\u0932 \u0915\u0940 \u: Anil's mother is falsely accused of theft and sent to jail. Years later, he becomes a famous artist and returns his mother's lost respect. But his fame makes many enemies for him.
\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0915\u093e\u0936, \u: Prakash hatches a plan to extort money from his unbelieving father-in-law. He is joined by Rahul and Harry, who are in dire need of money and help him kidnap his wife as part of the plan.
\u0928\u091c\u092e\u093e, \u0938\u0932\u: Najma loves Salim, but cannot marry until she is financially stable. When a rich old man, Shakir, proposes to marry her, she gets him married to Shabnam, who is in love with Sarju.
\u090f\u0915 \u092f\u0941\u0935\u0915 \u: A young man unexpectedly meets a mysterious woman, whom he suspects of being a ghost. However, his worst fears come true when his mother arranges his marriage to the same woman.
\u090f\u0915 \u0932\u093e\u0932\u091a\u0: A greedy son throws his elderly parents out of the house. Years later, his son decides to teach him a lesson and throws him out of the house.
\u0938\u0941\u0932\u094d\u0924\u093e\u09: Sultan raises an orphan, Babu, who grows up to be a criminal named Badshah. He changes his ways when he falls in love with Sapna, but Sultan tries to remind him of his past.
\u0926\u094b\u0938\u094d\u0924, \u0936\u: Friends, Shankar and Shambhu have a lot in common and are in love with the same girl. When the girl falls in love with Shankar, Shambhu breaks his friendship with him and joins the opposition.
\u0935\u093f\u091c\u092f \u0905\u092a\u0: Vijay grows up dreaming of solving his village's water problem. He decides to participate in a Kabaddi competition to attract the attention of the bureaucracy.
When Kalpana's parents believe her lies: When Kalpana's parents believe her lies about her husband Rajesh's newfound success and decide to visit her after she delivers a baby, Kalpana finds herself in a predicament.
\u0926\u0941\u0930\u094d\u0917\u093e \u0: Durga is an ordinary village girl whose family is brutally murdered by Thakur. She picks up a gun and chooses a criminal lifestyle to avenge the death of her family.
Believing his wife to be dead, Anand giv: Believing his wife to be dead, Anand gives up his own child to Yashoda, who has lost her husband and her baby. However, he faces a dilemma when his wife returns.
\u092c\u093e\u0926\u0936\u093e\u0939 \u0: Badshah Khan travels to India to find the murderer of Benazir's father so he can impress her. He succeeds but soon finds himself in an Indian prison accused of a murder.
\u092e\u0927\u0941\u0915\u0930 \u0914\u0: Madhukar and Jaggu set out to rule and oppress the people of a village by depriving them of education. Ramu, however, receives education secretly with the help of a school teacher.
\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0915\u093e\u0936 \u0: Prakash has to take care of the responsibilities of the entire family after the sudden death of his father. Her younger brother Chandan constantly tries to ruin her married life.
\u0936\u094d\u092f\u093e\u092e \u0905\u0: Shyam comes to India to fulfill the last wish of his late mother who wanted him to marry an Indian girl. Unknowingly he falls in love with a girl who has become a pawn in the hands of his enemies.
\u0905\u0927\u093f\u0915\u093e\u0930\u09: Officer Kapil takes the help of underworld man, Azam, to get evidence against the crook, D'Costa. When Azam is killed, his son, Akbar, holds Kapil responsible and takes revenge.
A rich girl runs away from home and sett: A rich girl runs away from home and settles down with a truck driver. However, her dream life is shattered when she learns that her new lover has been accused of murder.
\u090f\u0915 \u091a\u094b\u0930, \u091f\: A thief, Tony is always under the radar of the police, whether he commits a crime or not. Things change when Tony gets the opportunity to help the police catch a criminal.
\u0926\u0940\u0935\u093e\u0930 - \u0932\: Deewaar - Let's Bring Our Heroes Home
\u092d\u093e\u0930\u0924\u0940\u092f \u0: A group of Indian soldiers are captured during the Indo-Pak war. Gaurav's father, Major Ranveer, has been taken captive by the enemies and decides to go on a rescue mission.
\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0947\u092e \u092e\u0: Prem Mehra loses all his wealth when his rival Dharamdas, along with Prem's employee, steals his diamonds. Now Prem's sons will have to compensate for this loss to the family.
\u092a\u0941\u0932\u093f\u0938 \u0938\u0: After escaping from the police, a criminal named Pehalwan pretends to be a Baba. Soon, under the guise of this, he gathers many devotees and also carries out illegal activities.
Jai's father asks him to meet Sunita bef: Jai's father asks him to meet Sunita before getting married to her. However, complications arise when Jai falls in love with Kimi, while on his way to Sunita's village.
\u090f\u0915 \u092a\u0941\u0932\u093f\u0: Samar, a police inspector, gets transferred because of his honesty. A corrupt politician gets angry at him, which puts his and his family's lives in danger.
\u0917\u0940\u0924\u093e \u0917\u0930\u0: Geeta becomes pregnant but due to an incident she loses her child. When she finds a small child, she adopts him, but the child's family accuses her of kidnapping.
\u090f\u0915 \u0915\u093e\u0930 \u0926\u: A passing man, Prakash, is killed in a car accident and Sonam brings his dead body home. With the help of her lover, she disposes of his body but many problems arise.
\u0930\u093e\u091c\u093e \u092c\u0939\u0: Raja Bahadur gets involved in various illegal activities and his brother, Suraj always saves him. Suraj finds himself in a dilemma when Bahadur decides to marry Rekha, whom he loves.
\u0938\u0940\u0924\u093e \u0915\u0947 \u: Sita's sleep walking disorder causes worry for her husband and family. When they investigate, they discover that his behavior is linked to his past life.
\u0906\u0928\u0902\u0926, \u0909\u0928\u: Anand, his wife and daughter, Neha lead a happy life. Neha meets Nandita and a close relationship starts forming between them. Things take a turn when it is revealed that she is actually Neha's biological mother.
\u0930\u093e\u091c\u0947\u0936 \u0915\u0: Rajesh never opposed the changes of British rule but does so after his brother's death. He also leaves his girlfriend Kamini and goes away, which affects their relationship.
\u0921\u0949\u0970 \u0936\u0930\u094d\u0: Dr. Sharma hires Aarti, a young qualified nurse, for his clinic in rural India after posting an advertisement in the newspaper. He soon falls in love with the nurse but is unaware of her past.
\u090f\u0915 \u0930\u093f\u0936\u094d\u0: A Relationship: The Bond of Love
\u090f\u0915 \u0935\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0: Vijay, a businessman, throws his son Ajay out of the house because of his different ideologies. However, when Ajay comes to know about his brother-in-law's evil intentions, he decides to help his family.
\u092e\u0927\u0941\u092e\u093f\u0924\u09: Madhumita and Vishwanathan love each other but Vishwanathan's father disapproves of the relationship as he wants his twin sons to marry twin girls.
\u0939\u094b\u0932\u0940, \u0930\u0902\u: A perfect mix of music to celebrate Holi, the festival of colours. This is the most fun and boisterous Hindu festival, which celebrates love and the month of spring.
\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0924\u093f\u092d\u09: A wide selection of popular and evergreen songs composed by talented artists is presented.
A comprehensive compilation of some of t: A comprehensive compilation of some of the popular romantic songs by various artists played back-to-back to entertain the audience.
\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0947\u092e\u0940, \u: The lovers, Payal and Chetan run away because their parents do not approve of their relationship. They start a new life working for Geeta, but they are unaware of Geeta's true intentions.
Pinky, the granddaughter of a wealthy in: Pinky, the granddaughter of a wealthy industrialist, runs away and marries a taxi driver. However, the businessman holds Pinky's lover responsible and gets him arrested.
\u0930\u093e\u091c\u0915\u0941\u092e\u09: Prince Pratap Singh asks the ambitious Raju to disguise himself as a prince in front of Princess Poonam. Rajkumari falls in love with Raju but he is unaware of her poor background.
\u090f\u0915 \u092f\u0941\u0935\u0915 \u: A young man falls in love with a woman from a red light area, but their love faces opposition and danger from powerful people.
\u091f\u093f\u092f\u093e \u0938\u0947 \u: Jai, a rich businessman who is in love with Tia, accidentally kills her husband in a car accident. Tia loses her memory after the accident and falls in love with Jai, who struggles with guilt.
\u0905\u0928\u0941\u0930\u093e\u0927\u09: After the death of Anuradha's mother, her father remarries a young woman, Anita. Anita dislikes Anuradha and tries to get her addicted to alcohol to throw her out of the house.
\u092d\u093e\u0908 \u092c\u0939\u0928, \: Brother and sister decide to share a pair of shoes until their father buys a new shoe. But things change when his father, unable to find a job, is suspected of being a criminal.
Arjun Pratap Singh, an IPS officer, stri: Arjun Pratap Singh, an IPS officer, strives to overcome multiple challenges and embarks on a mission to restore peace in society.
\u0930\u093e\u091c\u093e \u0915\u094b \u: Raja falls in love but must face his doppelganger, Rocky, to win over his girlfriend's father. Difficulties arise when the king becomes Rocky and Rocky becomes the king.
\u0936\u093e\u0926\u0940 \u0915\u0947 \u: After marriage, an uneducated man named Phullu realizes the problems women face during menstruation. After this, he decides to spread awareness about this issue.
